400740.name: VERGE:Lost chapter
400740.description:
Our hero decided to escape from the hustle and bustle of the city and get out into nature to relax in a cabin that was in the mountains.
Amazing sunsets, fresh air, the tranquility of the mountains, but then a sandstorm started. His car broke down, the dust robbed him of any hope of getting his car repaired...
He didn't encounter a single soul while he waited for the dust storm to end. Was there an abandoned building nearby, or did it only appear abandoned?


Features:
-High quality graphics
-Tense atmosphere of fear
-High quality audio support.
-Simple but enjoyable gameplay.
